players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and he knows who the mafioso is."
You: "Alice is acting suspiciously and was seen near the scene of the crime last night."
You: "Alice is acting even more suspiciously now and was seen near the scene of the crime twice last night."
Charlie: "I will continue to investigate and gather more evidence. The mafioso is Alice, but I need to confirm it."
